img_summary: This image depicts the drink "Lambrew," a rare consumable item in the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is described as a health-recovery item that instantly restores 20% of maximum health and gradually recovers an additional 25% afterward. The drink can be found behind the Sandgate Village - Village Entrance Shrine, at the beginning of Chapter 2, "Yellow Wind Ridge." The image serves as a visual representation of the item for players to identify it in-game.
